ValueMeaning.preferredName: Mild (does not affect walking or my daily routine)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Mild (does not affect walking or my daily routine)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Moderate (it is bothersome and affects my walking but I am able to do my daily routine)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Severe (this problem significantly affects my walking and my daily routine)
